timeline.message: Restore ability to load LOINC PartLink data from a single file for pre-2.68 versions.

timeline.body:
Nitpick.

```suggestion
				msg = "Could not find any of the PartLink files: " + notFoundMulti + " nor " + notFoundSingle;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Nitpick.

Suggested change
msg = "Could not find any of the PartLink files: " + notFoundMulti + " or " + notFoundSingle;
msg = "Could not find any of the PartLink files: " + notFoundMulti + " nor " + notFoundSingle;
timeline.author: dmuylwyk

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
msg = "Found both the single PartLink file, " + theSinglePartLinkFile + ", and the split PartLink files: " + theMultiPartLinkFiles;
msg = "Only either the single PartLink file or the split PartLink files can be present. Found both the single PartLink file, " + theSinglePartLinkFile + ", and the split PartLink files: " + theMultiPartLinkFiles;
timeline.author: dmuylwyk

timeline.message: Fixed tests to accommodate suggested changes from code review.
